original_text: I was doing this in the yard of the temple when these men found me. I had obeyed all the rules to make myself clean in front of God. There was no crowd with me. Nobody was arguing or fighting because of me.
korean_text: 드리는 중에 내가 결례를 행하였고 모임도 없고 소동도 없이 성전에 있는 것을 그들이 보았나이다 그러나 아시아로부터 온 어떤 유대인들이 있었으니

sentences.original_text: I was doing this in the yard of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 성전 뜰에서 이 일을 하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: I had obeyed all the rules
to make myself clean in front of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님 앞에서 스스로를 깨끗하게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: There was no crowd with me
